notes:
<noinclude>[[File:Tibia's 15th Anniversary! Chayenne!|thumb|300px|Huge team taking Chayenne down]]</noinclude> Appeared during the [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary]], in a raid at a random time once a day.

Before Chayenne appeared, two messages were broadcasted to the [[Game Worlds|server]]:
* '''A baby dragon has appeared on Draconia. Something dangerous is about to happen...'''
* 20 minutes later: '''Chayenne is going wild on Draconia.'''
name: Chayenne (Creature)
strategy: Trap her behind one of her summons and kill her fast.
